description: This Dart source file implements a Flutter application for a cinematic TV interface, including UI components such as home screen, featured media carousel, recommendations, navigation tabs, profile overlay, and focus/traversal logic for TV remote navigation.

classes.name: TvApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up Material 3 theme, providing the main application entry point, including initial routing to HomeScreen.

classes.name: MediaItem
classes.description: Model class representing media content with title, image URL, and tags.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget implementing TV-like home UI with navigation, featured media, recommendations, profile overlay, and focus/traversal logic.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing UI state, focus nodes, navigation, and interactions for HomeScreen.

classes.name: _TvSearchField
classes.description: Custom focusable search input styled for TV remote focus behavior.

classes.name: _NavTabs
classes.description: Horizontal row of navigation tabs with focus and active indication.

classes.name: _NavTab
classes.description: Individual tab widget with focus, hover, and activation handling.

classes.name: _FeaturedRow
classes.description: Horizontal media carousel with focusable cards and related metadata panel.

classes.name: _FeaturedCard
classes.description: Focusable media poster card with focus effects and activation to open media.

classes.name: _RightMetadataPanel
classes.description: Details panel displaying selected media info, actions, and description.

classes.name: _Chip
classes.description: UI chip badge for media tags or info.

classes.name: _PillBadge
classes.description: Small badge widget for tags or labels.

classes.name: _PrimaryButton
classes.description: Styled primary action button for media actions.

classes.name: _OutlineButton
classes.description: Outlined button for secondary actions.

classes.name: _IconButtonTv
classes.description: Icon button with hover and focus style, used for utilities.

classes.name: _AvatarButton
classes.description: Circular avatar button with focus effects, used for profile access.

classes.name: _RecommendationsRail
classes.description: Horizontal scroll of recommended media cards with focus handling.

classes.name: _RailCard
classes.description: Focusable small media card for recommendations rail.

classes.name: _ProfileOverlay
classes.description: Overlay panel with slide-in animation displaying profile options.

classes.name: _ProfileMenuItem
classes.description: Menu item in profile overlay with focus and hover effects.

classes.name: DirectionalFocusIntent
classes.description: Custom intent for directional focus movement via remote arrows.
